channel.title: (Help) Changing Text In Game (Will REP)
channel.description:
I wanted to know where i can change the text in the client server for example:
Under the quest tab, it shows the owner and creators of the client, i would like to put my name that im the owner of the server but keeping the creators name of the client for some credit to them.
[img]http://screensnapr.com/v/1IUuqV.png[/img] http://screensnapr.com/v/1IUuqV.png
also when i start up runescape a box pops up on the bottom of the screen, i would like to change it to saying "Welcome to Evo's Server" but keeping "official Teamtorva 317"
[img]http://screensnapr.com/v/Z4DLn1.png[/img] http://screensnapr.com/v/Z4DLn1.png

item.title: (Help) Changing Text In Game (Will REP)
item.dc:creator: @RuneForge_RSPS RuneForge RSPS
item.description:
@RuneForge_RSPS wrote:

Well, it’s either server sided, or client sided.

For serversided.

Go to client.java and search for whatever text you want to edit. (This is in your source).

For client sided.

Go to client.java and search for whatever text you want to edit. (This is in your client).

If you cannot find where to edit this, search in the main folder a key word, (one).

Read full topic
